DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate achievement ratio treatment target goal hypercholesterolemia patient high risk high dose rosuvastatin ( 20mg/day ) titration
DOC.brief_title: Real-life EValuation Of High Dose RosUvastatin High Risk Patients After TitraTION
DOC.criteria: Highrisk hyperlipidemia patient prescribe rosuvastatin 10mg , base physician 's clinical decision fulfill follow criterion 1 . Over 18 year age 2 . Have history CHD CHD risk equivalent , peripheral arterial disease , abdominal aortic aneurysm , symptomatic carotid artery disease ( TIA stroke carotid origin > 50 % obstruction carotid artery ) , DM , 2+ risk factor 10year risk CHD > 20 % 1 . Patients already take hyperlipidemic agent 2 . Patients fulfil indication criterion statin therapy 3 . Patients baseline and/or followup lipid data verify efficacy data
